page.title: 19A Day in the life of Emma
page.content: In the morning I have my breakfast of cereal with milk and a cup of tea. Then I get washed and dressed. Some days I have to be very quiet as Dad has just come off nightshift. He works different 8 hour shifts. I wait for Lucy then we walk for five minutes to reach school. I deliver the registers to the classrooms. At nine o'clock the bell rings. We do daily 10 sums until Assembly time. Later we do maths until break. After play we do English and at about 11.45 our teacher reads us a story. I go for dinner at 12.00 and eat my packed lunch. In the afternoon we do our communications project. Later we have playtime then we have a free choice lesson. School finishes at 3.30. After tea I play with Lucy.
